title: Saxoshi
author: Saxoshi
content: Hello, if you wan to sell your LTC Block Ballet or Alpen 1 Million Bar, let me know what is your offer through PM.Keep safe,Saxoshi.

comments.author: PreciousMetapsICT
comments.body: Those Alpen 1 million bars are beautiful in person. Good luck on your search!

comments.author: yf920
comments.body: I have a LTC block card for sale, DM me if you are interested.Thanks!
